lines.text: So what do you think?
What do I *think*? Um, do you really wanna know?
[Brad laughs]
Just being a smart ass.
Just being a smart ass. Yeah, well everybody's a smart ass every now and then. We won't hold it against ya Megan. Hey, guys, I mean to not cause any trouble but, since when do we let women in here?

[Eric laughs]
Good point!
I don't know, those girls on the wall there, they seem welcome enough.
They're different. Look what they're wearing.
Yep! No women. Unless those women are wearing no tops.
Eric, That's *so* mature.
Actually, Megan that's the rules. Right, guys?
Those are the rules.
Well, If those are the rules, guess I better follow the rules eh?
Now we're talking! Take it off!

[Megan teases them by lifting her shirt then quickly putting it back down]
Woah!
I actually thought she was gonna do that.
Yeah, you know what? That's because you're drunk. and whoa, whoa, so am I... just shouldn't have gotten up like that.
No, you know what Kyle? I think I'd better go, okay? I'm just gonna go.
Luke, c'mon she's my friend.

[to Megan]
Sit down. Look at me, Megan. Look at me. Do you see how I'm not laughing?
Okay, um, what- what the hell's going on here?
Well, what's going on is we're gonna have a little show and you're the entertainment. Take off you're uh, top. Follow the rules.
Okay, um, are you guys just gonna sit there?
Yeah, they're just gonna sit there. They're waiting. Megan!
C'mon, man!
You're gonna learn to like this.
[Megan slowly unbuttons her top]
Have you seen this before, Kyle? Huh? Now's you're chance. C'mon! Take it off! Take off that last button!
C'mon man!
That's a good girl, Megan. Isn't she a good girl, boys? Ha ha ha.
[Megan runs out of the clubhouse]
What the hell are you, man? Big secret fucking hiding place here!
[Kyle throws the news article about Luke]
It's a fucking nightmare!
[Kyle goes out of the clubhouse to chase after Megan]
This is the rashest thing that's ever happened to us before.
Right, what are we even talking about this for?
Why don't we just go home?
The guy's a fucking fugitive, man.
Great. I hate this, you realize that?
What? What do you hate?
Yeah, O'Leary's. The guy said it's the police they're after. So why don't we just not do this, okay? Are you even listening to me?
No.
Look at this thing.
[Kyle, Brad and Eric see a old car]
What does it say about him? I guess he was a little bit disappointed.
C'mon he's a cop Brad, we got to help him.

We don't... we don't even know they guy, I mean, we might be accomplices. Kyle, the guy's been shot. He needs real medical attention, I mean we could have a real doctor go down there and no one would know the difference.
What? Look you heard what he said right? The only thing he's got is us. Us three, our shack, our fucking shit, okay? Alright? Let's go Kyle.
[They start to push the car]
One, two, three.
[Brad stops pushing the car]
This doesn't have to be a big deal Brad, we pushed the car so what?
Here we go, Bradley, are you in or are you out? Hun?
I said you'll have to leave or we'll call the police.
Oh, relax okay?
That's it Barney, call the police.
Yeah, Barney cause you got first big guy? Hey ah, do you like this? *Points to the bottle of wine*
Put the bottle back, sir.

They're good guys, but no one cares. Your friends, they don't care, they're good guys but they really don't care if you're a pilot. Your school they don't care, your family, it sounds like they want you to fail, so why care about them, why care what they think?
I don't know.
No one cared about me when I grew up; I can tell you that. You know what I learned about the world? You do unto others, you eat what you kill and that's what life is.
You're not a cop are you?
Your friends say that?
No, no one just... just me kinda.

[after Megan runs out of the clubhouse because Luke tried to sexually intimidate her]
Megan!
Get away from me!
Megan, stop please!
Go back to your pig friends Kyle!
Look, I'm so sorry, I don't know how...
*Emotional voice* You just stood there! You didn't do anything! I should call the cops for that!
No, no, no! You can't call the cops! I know we deserve it!
You know what? Hell, my friends were right about you. You're a big loser like your whole family!

[Kyle gasps]
Megan! I don't know what that was! I...
Fuck off, Kyle!

[shouting to Eric, Brad and Luke]
You guys happy now?
Did anything come?
Like what?
Dad, the test results, whether I got in, It's coming any day.
Starting your line pilot exam.

[Scoffs]
Yeah, maybe.

Well, I pulled double-down at the hanger and I come home and i see that none of ya's has even picked up uh even a finger to help me out, out here but that's okay, I'm used to that. But unless your school takes monopoly money, your working for me this summer, boy. You uh, wanna lean about air plains, I'll teach ya about air plains, you can start with the engines.
Beep Beep. You going home?
Dickhead friend ripped us off. Tell him to give us our booze back.
Simon, give these children their alcoholic beverages back.
Catch, boys.
[Simon throws the beer over the car, it hits the gravel and shatters]
I did my part. Listen, tell daddy I'm not gonna be home for dinner cuz uh, he's on the rag. Kay?
Yeah well, I'm not going home either.
Whatever. That's a good idea.
Let's motor.
Well, whats your problem?
Guess what? Congratulate me.

[Kyle's Dad scoffs]
We've talked about that about 20 times didn't we?
Wrong. They didn't accept me. But you didn't know that did you? You didn't even read it did you?
Kyle, I just didn't want you to be disappointed.
Oh, Jesus, thank you fucking so much, thank you!
Hey! You be careful mister.
You were so sure right Dad? I almost got in. They want me to take the test again. Guess that never happened to you, huh?
Kyle?
[grumbles]
Ya know, you're like a professional fucking asshole!
[Kyle gets on his bike and takes off]
Kyle? Come back. Kyle?
Just keep on going, Kyle!
While he does that you get roughed up a little bit is that okay?
You big man? What you gonna shove me around? Huh, c'mon you think I fucking care?
Oh, what?

[Jake makes ninja sounds]
C'mon! Lets go!
[Jake makes more ninja sounds, Kyle's Dad angrily shoves Jake to the ground]
Bobby, come and get your supper.
See ya later.
Okay, see ya Bob.
No, he's a fucking cheese sandwich. I mean, he sucks about this, he suck's about that, he suck's about everything!. And now the bullets! He can't even protect himself!
He isn't a cop eh? Yeah, he told me.
What?
Don't tell Brad.
He told you?
[He mutters]
Oh, we're in shit.
Eric, come over here please?
You too sir?
Dead, we're dead, we're diffidently dead, we're dead, we're dead.
Okay, what are we gonna do?
We're gonna say it was as stupid as hell right?
Kyle! Kyle, I am not going back there!
Kyle! The fuck happened? Where's the fucking car?
Shut up! Kyle, are you okay?
Yeah.
We're getting a car! My Mom's car! We'll get my Mom's car!
Shut up!
We'll fucking get my Mom's car!
Kyle!

[to Brad]
He's gonna kill him asshole!
Yeah! He's gonna kill all of us asshole! Do you understand?
Guys! I'm just trying to think okay?
You weren't there! He fuckin' shot em!

[Yelling]
Guys I'm trying to think, okay?
What the fuck? What the fuck is happening?
That's it! I'm calling 911. We're getting the cops in here and I'm...

[Eric grabs Brad]
You fucking think he wants to hear that? Huh? You think he wants to hear that? You don't care if his brother dies do you?
I'm not the one who brought the bullets now did I? Fucking punk!
[Eric and Brad fight on the ground]

[to Eric]
You are a very average, boring stupid guy! With a big mouth and I don't respect you and I never have!
Fuck you, you asshole!

[to Eric]
Your old man has a gun?
Eric...
Yeah! He's got a box of em' in the closet!
Okay, why does somebody ask for bullets? To shoot bullets. At what? People. What are we? 5?

[Sarcastically]
He's a cop, smart guy. I mean he's gotta have some sort of protection.
So we have to get involved in it? Look, If anyone gets hurt now, it's because of us. Or you to, cuz' I'm out of this.
Wait! We'll- we'll just tell him we couldn't get it.
What? Alright fine, okay I- I don't even care anymore.
Eric, I'm right this time.
Hi Eric! Back from the library?
Hi Mom.

[Whispers to Eric]
Catching up on some school Eric?
Yeah well, what she doesn't know can't get us in a lot of shit!

[to Eric]
Study hard?
Yeah! Chemistry is really fascinating Mom.
We're proud of you, honey.
[Eric nervously laughs]
Simon, over here!
Kyle, what's he-?
Simon, you got it right?
[Referring to the beer]
Yes, thank you.
Oh, big surprise. He's taking it from...
Oh, c'mon don't be an asshole, just give us our booze!

[scoffs]
What are you gonna do about it huh? You gonna fight me for it? Huh? You wanna come and get it, I'll give it to you huh? Come and get it!
[Simon pushes Kyle]
C'mon!
[Talking to Brad]
What about you? What are you gonna do about it?

[Mutters to Kyle and Eric]
Let's go.

[to Luke]
Look who's in charge now! See how this works, you motherfucker?
Guys!
Not so fucking tough anymore are ya!
Kyle! Kyle! Kyle! C'mon! Kyle!

[to Luke]
Look at me! This gun's what it's all about, you filthy fuck!

[Softly]
C'mon Kyle.
So what? Use it.

[to Kyle]
Don't do it, man. Kyle!
Use it.
C'mon, Brad.
Kyle, Don't do this, man. Kyle.
How at this point, am I gonna shoot anybody?
No.
No. We're just sitting around and talking. So why have a loaded and cocked gun? You push this and out pops the cylinder.
Then you use the ejector rod right?

Very good. You use the ejector rod. But the most important thing I wanna teach you boys, is that you never *ever* point a gun at *anyone* or yourself even if you think it's unloaded, you don't look don't the barrel when your cleaning it you just don't do it. But for me it's a little different.
[Luke cocks the gun and points it to his head]

I'll do it. Cause I *know* that there is no bullets in this gun. I just know it. What are they gonna do? Pop into the gun out of nowhere? Just by fuckin' magic? No. So I'm not scared. Cause it's bullshit.
[Luke pulls the trigger, the gun doesn't go off, and Luke smiles]
Cause it's an empty gun. Huh. that's an example of what not to do. I did it this once to prove a point.

[Luke is talking on Kyle's Dad's phone]
I know where I am. What are you telling me? Kyle! Come out here for a second! What? That was along time ago! Oh, gimme a break! Wait a second.

[to Kyle]
I'm thinking tonight. Can you help me?
Yeah. sure.

[Inside the clubhouse]
It had to look like a break in, Brad. I mean what was he supposed to do?
Yeah, but your own dad's car?
Oh, fuss...
So- whats your point?
I don't know its just- it's weird. It's something Jake would do.
Jake didn't do it, I did it. He pissed me off. Fuck off Brad, I don't care.
Hey, hey, relax okay, guys? Alright?

[Luke is outside talking on the phone distantly]
I've had a radio all day, I haven't done it. Fuck you. Wait, it's the battery. Can you hear me? okay, fuck you. Now you hear me clear that time? Listen, now your cutting off, Betty? Betty, hello?

[Luke starts banging the phone on a old tire wheel]
Fuck! Fuck! Fuck!

[to Kyle]
He just trashed you dad's phone. Not kidding about ten times.

[Luke comes inside the clubhouse]
Uh, sorry this things uh, busted. You boys stay out late tonight? Just get me to the road. Can't stay here.
No problem.
Need a road map. Gotta swipe a car. This is it boys.
What are you doing?
What?
Go ahead.
Oh you mean ta- yeah. Yeah, right.
We've outlined the rules. Very specifically. Women have to take off their tops. Right boys?
That's uh, pretty funny.
Go ahead.
Why?
Brad.
Okay, Hold on, are you some kind of pervert or something?
Okay, Lets say we talk about something else hey guys?
Yeah, yeah.
